intro.label: Intro
intro.name: Shamim Bin Zahid
intro.greetings: Hi I'm Shamim Bin Zahid ðŸ‘‹
intro.tagline: UI/UX Designer, Software Product Manager & Engineer
intro.quote: Making the world slightly better with better designed "Things"

about.label: About Me
about.value: I am a data-driven UI/UX designer with over 4 years of experience creating intuitive, functional, and user-focused design solutions that drive business growth. I've worked on and also led design and development teams across diverse industries, including e-commerce, recruitment, telco, telemedicine, edtech, freelancing, and logistics. I am always open to feedback and eager to learn.

resume.label: View CV
resume.subtitle: Usually updated every month, Reach out if out of date.

contact.label: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach out using the form or thru email

responsibilities: Collaborate to define and prioritize the product roadmap based on business and user needs.
Conduct user research to identify pain points and preferences, Analyze user feedback to inform product decisions.
Create user-friendly designs that align with product goals.
Work with developers to ensure smooth design implementation and conduct QA processes to ensure product quality.
Led, managed & trained the UI/UX design team, taking ownership of the design process from concept to execution.
Performed requirement analysis, prepared software design specifications and ensured alignment between client needs and technical implementations in an agile scrum environment.
Developed information architecture and partnered with backend teams to create system designs and database models.
Handled the majority of design decisions, designing UIs, including wireframes, prototypes, and design systems for brands.
Worked closely with the frontend team, including creating design guides, design reviews, and code reviews.
Conducted usability testing and manual QA testing, providing detailed reports for continuous improvement.
Conducted client demonstrations and played an instrumental role in recruiting for the UI/UX and Frontend development teams.
Managed and oversaw the design process of B2B and B2C systems across industries, including pharmaceuticals, healthcare, e-commerce, and recruitment management.
Led the UI/UX design of the projects, managing end-to-end product design processes across multiple products.
Took a hands-on approach in designing responsive UIs and prototypes while leading product decisions.
Conducted user research to inform design strategy, translating insights into high-quality design solutions.
Defined requirements for frontend teams, collaborated on system design and development, and led product demonstrations for clients.
Managed design deliverables for B2C and B2B platforms in sectors like e-commerce, telemedicine, freelancing, and education.
Involved in software testing and documentation (requirement analysis, design documentation, user guides, etc.)
Designed UI/UX for software products, iterating based on client feedback and user research.
Managed design decisions from system wireframes to final interface designs for various applications.
Contributed to system design and collaborated on data models for client projects.

activities: Served as Class Representative for four years
Lead management and volunteered in multiple departmental events
Served as Executive Member leading up to the Vice President of the CSEDU Student Club
Volunteered as an Executive member at DU Science Society (DUSS) and DU IT Society (DUITS)
Councilor at Dhaka City College Student Council
Volunteered in organizing college events as a council member

values.title: Making EULA Great Again: A Novel Nudge Mechanism to Improve Readability, User Attention and Awareness
values.authors: Shamim Bin Zahid, Aishwarya Ghosh Bristy, Mushfiqur Hasan Oli, Md Fahim, Sarker T Ahmed Rumee, Moinul Islam Zaber
values.conference: 20th International Conference on Information Systems Security

values.title: Safeguarding User Privacy through Effective Information Disclosure Summary from the Software End-User License Agreements (EULAs)
values.authors: Shamim Bin Zahid, Aishwarya Ghosh Bristy, Sarker T Ahmed Rumee, Moinul Islam Zaber
values.conference: 6th International Conference on Imaging, Vision & Pattern Recognition (IVPR) & the 11th International Conference on Informatics, Electronics & Vision (ICIEV)

values.title: EULA Usability Project
values.authors: Shamim Bin Zahid, Aishwarya Ghosh Bristy
values.conference: Undergraduate Thesis at University of Dhaka
values.abstract: A user research study investigating the usability of current privacy policy representations and how summarizing impacts on users' awareness of their online information privacy. Followed by development of a tool that summarizes the privacy policies for them.

values.title: Intra Department Programming Contest 2019: 14th out of 137 participants in DU
Second Runners Up in Higher Secondary Category

crafts.label: My Crafts
crafts.description: Helping businesses craft their digital experience and online presence

values.name: Airwork AI
values.summary: Redesigning the Airwork AI website to enhance usability and clarity of information to the target audiences. The project involved a complete overhaul of the website's structure, content, and completely new design system to ensure a seamless user experience.

values.name: Robi & Airtel
values.summary: Redesigning the Robi Bangladesh and Airtel Bangladesh websites under Axiata Group, unifying app-level functionalities from the My Robi & My Airtel apps into a seamless web experience for both guest and logged-in users. Worked with a 5-member design team, focusing on telecom service flows, UX research, and accessibility.
descriptions: Worked with a team of 5 designers to revamp both Robi and Airtel websites.
The goal was to unify app-level functionalities (from My Robi & My Airtel apps) into a seamless web experience, both logged-in and guest users.
Focused heavily on UX research, telecom service flows, and accessibility.

values.name: ProHR
values.summary: A hiring management platform featuring automated video screening tests, quizzes, assessments, and interviews â€” streamlining recruitment workflows for HR teams and simplifying candidate evaluation.

values.name: Supplers
values.summary: An online community platform for the furniture and interior design industry, allowing manufacturers, suppliers, and stakeholders to create profiles, showcase products and projects, share news/files, and engage in professional communication â€” enhancing business networking in Nordic countries like Sweden, Denmark, and Finland.

values.name: HealthOS
values.summary: One of the largest B2B medicine distributions platform in Bangladesh, with supporting ecommerce, delivery and inventory management systems.

values.name: Exam Batch
values.summary: A web app for students and teachers to create, take, and evaluate exams using a dynamic question bank. Focused on personalization, custom tests, practice exams, and real-time results feedback for effective exam preparation.
descriptions: Exam Batch was designed for students and teachers to create, take, and evaluate exams using a dynamic question bank.
Focused on personalization, practice exams, and real-time results feedback.

values.name: 1Class
values.summary: A short-form, live video class platform offering bite-sized academic sessions tailored for the Bangladeshi education context. The interface was optimized for video delivery, fast interactions, and class scheduling.
descriptions: 1Class is a web app aimed at providing bite-sized, live academic sessions for quick learning in the Bangladeshi education context.
The interface was optimized for video delivery, class scheduling, and fast interactions.

values.name: Precise Mentorship
values.summary: A scalable edtech platform helping students prepare for competitive university entrance exams in Bangladesh. Prioritized seamless UX for high-traffic usage, smooth course access, video playback, and progress tracking.
descriptions: Precise Mentorship is a scalable education platform designed to help students prepare for competitive university entrance exams.
Focused on seamless UX for high-traffic course access, video playback, and progress tracking.

values.name: Genweb2
values.summary: Corporate website and landing page for a Bangladeshi software development firm, designed to highlight services, case studies, and the client onboarding process â€” using visual storytelling to build trust and showcase development credibility.
descriptions: Designed and structured Genweb2â€™s website to highlight services, case studies, and client onboarding.
Emphasized corporate trust and development credibility through visual storytelling.

values.name: Somadha
values.summary: A customizable freelance marketplace tailored for the Bangladeshi market, supporting localized experiences with features like custom pricing, skill-based filtering, and quick service onboarding for both clients and freelancers.
descriptions: Somadha is a freelancer-client matching platform focused on localizing the freelance experience for Bangladesh.
The system is built to support custom pricing, skill filters, and rapid service onboarding.

values.name: Pharmik
values.summary: A B2B SaaS platform designed for pharmaceutical suppliers and retailers in Bangladesh. Offers inventory, sales, staff, and ledger management via a unified dashboard to improve business efficiency.
descriptions: Pharmik enables businesses to manage sales, inventory, staff, and ledgers through a unified dashboard.
Targeted to improve operational efficiency in the Bangladeshi pharmaceutical sector.

values.name: BeeBox
values.summary: An experimental SaaS logistics platform aimed at unifying buyers, sellers, and couriers. Focused on delivery tracking, stakeholder coordination, and real-time UX â€” ran briefly before being shelved.
descriptions: BeeBox was an experimental logistics product designed to unify all stakeholders in the delivery cycle.
It focused heavily on UX, real-time delivery tracking, and driver-client coordination.
Ran briefly before being shelved.

values.name: 1Menu
values.summary: An Android TV-based digital signage system for stores to display dynamic menus. Comes with a centralized admin panel to manage content and schedule changes remotely â€” optimized for store-level digital interaction.
descriptions: 1Menu is a digital signage and content control system developed for stores to showcase menus on Android TVs.
Paired with a central admin panel to manage content and schedule changes remotely.

values.name: Latitude23
values.summary: Landing page for a digital branding solutions company, built with a focus on responsive layout, strong brand identity, and modern visual hierarchy â€” representing the creative agencyâ€™s unique positioning.
descriptions: Designed a visually striking landing page for Latitude23, a creative agency specializing in digital branding and strategy.
Focused on strong brand identity, visual hierarchy, and responsive layout.

values.name: CardiCheck
values.summary: CardiCheck is a telehealth platform developed for a renowned cardiologist in Florida, designed to modernize her cardiology clinic's patient care. It enables remote cardiac consultations, effortless health monitoring, and delivers personalized insights to help patients manage and improve their heart health â€” all from the comfort of home.

values.name: Sumash Tech
values.summary: UI/UX optimization for a major electronics e-commerce platform in Bangladesh. Focused on enhancing product discoverability, enabling faster checkout, and ensuring mobile responsiveness across devices.
descriptions: Worked on UI/UX optimization for the Sumash Tech website, a top electronics retail brand in Bangladesh.
Focused on product discoverability, fast checkout, and seamless mobile responsiveness.

values.name: Sobar Daktar
values.summary: A telehealth platform enabling remote medical consultations, appointment bookings, and access to medical records â€” with a multilingual, accessible UI designed for users in rural and underserved areas. The platform was later closed.
descriptions: Sobar Daktar was built to enable remote consultations, appointment booking, and medical record access.
Design focused on accessibility, especially for rural users, with multilingual UI support.

values.name: Teezarat
values.summary: An e-commerce Android app built for a construction equipment business in the B2B space. Designed for usability on mid-range Android devices, emphasizing clarity, intuitive categorization, and inquiry-based purchases.
descriptions: Teezarat was built for a niche B2B market, allowing businesses to browse, inquire, and purchase construction tools and equipment.
The design prioritized clarity, product categorization, and usability on mid-range Android devices.

values.name: Quix Projects
values.summary: Landing page and service showcase site for Quixx Projects, currently Crantech LLC, formerly sister concern of Quix â€” Bangladeshâ€™s first AI-powered delivery platform. Highlighted their service evolution with modern design aesthetics and a clear service/contact flow.
descriptions: This landing page showcased Crantech's evolution from Quix, the first AI delivery platform in Bangladesh.
The site presents Crantech's services, product modules, and contact flow with modern design aesthetics.

values.name: QBSkool
values.summary: A two-sided edtech marketplace connecting students with tutors, allowing them to schedule lessons online. The interface was tailored to provide a personalized and intuitive tutoring experience. Later closed.
descriptions: QBSkool was designed to serve as a two-sided marketplace enabling students to find the right tutor and schedule lessons online.
The platform aimed to streamline the tutoring process with an intuitive interface and personalized learning experience.
